version_description:
- Fixed various errors causing problems.
- Fixed language problem preventing some people from using the app.
- Now automatically updating profil information we are visiting

- Fixed design problem with RTL language
- Fixed various other problems

- Fixed problem on search and visits page.
- Fixed data issue on profile tabs.
- Fixed various other others bugs.

- Fixed content size problem on iPhoneX
- Weekly bug fixes
Weekly bug fixes
Fixed a resize issue on the chat text field.
Bug fixes and improvements!
Bug fixes and improvements !

- Fixed problem when deleting some conversations
- Improved internal links to website.
- Fixed various other bugs.
Bug fixes and improvements !

- Fixed language inconsistency problem.
- Now saving typed text in the chat allowing you to switch conversations without losing data.

- Add "hijab" parameter to the search page
- Fixed problem reloading user list when selecting a new research

- Fixed problems with age/size/weight fields editions.
- Fixed synchronization problem of message filters.
- Various improvements.

Fixed holes in user list while scrolling.
Fixed session loss (and tutorials showing again) randomly when the device is using too much memory.
Fixed the display of height and weight fields when marked as "private".
Fixed issues on interface elements.

- Fixed problem preventing tutorials to close
- Various improvements
Fixed search parameter bug (size, weight, age)

- Fixed bug during email validation
- Fixed problem while taking photos on some devices
Fixes distance settings in search page
Fixed synchronisation problem on profile list
Bug fixes, stability improvements, etc.
Fixed a cache issue that could prevent the application from starting

- Fixed filter management.
- Fixed an issue that could prevent the application from booting.
- Add option to report user.
Fixed booting problem

- Added several options about "Report Profile" page
- Fixed issues
Fixed problem with push notifications
Improve performances. If you are having problems receiving notifications, uninstall and reinstall the application.

- Fixed loading and caching problem on the page that manages your blocked accounts.
- Display some missing parameters on the profile view.
- Facilitate subscription by implementing in-app payment.
Fixed problems related to payments
Bug fixes, stability improvements, etc.

Whatâ€™s up !
We know how difficult it is to find a soul mate, especially when your values are strong. InshAllah is the idea of allowing you to unite and start a family in accordance with your principles and the values of Islam.
Simple, basic.
We have completely redesigned InshAllah in order to simplify the experience and allow as many people as possible to use it. Scroll down to discover the profile, drag the card to the right to like it, to the left to pass it, it's as simple as that !
Profiles that tell a story!
Each person has a unique experience that makes them unique. By discovering their profile you also discover their history!
It's a match!
Congrats, you liked a profile that liked you back, it's a match, now you can chat ! This way you only chat with profiles you really like and you want to get to know.
Stay private.
Your love life is between you and the people of your choice. We offer you the possibility to manage the confidentiality of your profile very simply : Blurr your photos, choose the city in which you want to appear etc...
- Bug fix
- Optimization of the main page
Preparing the app for IOS 14.5

Bug fix:
- Chat synchronizes when opening a new message notification
- App opens normally for IOS versions below 14.4
- Bug fix et optimisation
- Bug fix
- Bug fix
